description:
This course is aimed at beginning website creators - anyone running small businesses, organizing teams and clubs, selling amazing handmade goods, sharing music and artwork, and educating the world about their favorite pastimes.

You no longer have to know how to program or write HMTL code in order to make your own website. Using Jimdo, the easiest do-it-yourself website builder on the web, anyone can create a simple yet beautiful website or online store.

With seven short lectures, totaling 40 minutes of video, this course will walk you through the following:

  • The entire process of creating a website
  • Adding pages, text, and images
  • Selecting a template
  • Changing colors and fonts
  • Modifying the background
  • And even adding additional features with third-party widgets.

Sign up and build your website today!
title: Create a Simple Website in Under 40 Minutes
